mutants.code:
def entrance(matrix):
    diagonals = [matrix[i][i] for i in range(len(matrix))]
    non_diagonals = list(set([element for row in matrix for element in row]) - set(diagonals))
    return diagonals - non_diagonals

def entrance(matrix):
    diagonals = [matrix[i][i] for i in range(len(matrix))]
    non_diagonals = list(set([element for row in matrix for element in row]) - set(diagonals))
    return diagonals * non_diagonals
